languages.text: "Какая патетика! Неужели ты и вправду доверял{mf||а} моей кузине? Считал{mf||а}, что между мон-каем и братом по крови она выберет тебя?" {n}Смех Маражая сочится ядом.{/n} "Уясни себе раз и навсегда: ты — животное. Когда у нас есть потребность в мон-кай, мы используем вас. Когда кого-то вроде тебя недостаточно — мы идем к равным. Как Ирлиэт пришла ко мне".

traits.locale_text: "Какая патетика! Неужели ты и вправду доверял{mf||а} моей кузине? Считал{mf||а}, что между мон-каем и братом по крови она выберет тебя?" {n}Смех Маражая сочится ядом.{/n} "Уясни себе раз и навсегда: ты — животное. Когда у нас есть потребность в мон-кай, мы используем вас. Когда кого-то вроде тебя недостаточно — мы идем к равным. Как Ирлиэт пришла ко мне".
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: "What a display! Did you truly put your trust in my cousin? Did you think that, between a mon-keigh and her blood brother, she would choose you?" {n}Marazhai's laughter drips with poison.{/n} "Remember this and never forget it: you are an animal. When we have need of mon-keigh, we use you. When we require something more, we turn to our equals. Just as Yrliet turned to me."
languages.original_text: "Какая патетика! Неужели ты и вправду доверял{mf||а} моей кузине? Считал{mf||а}, что между мон-каем и братом по крови она выберет тебя?" {n}Смех Маражая сочится ядом.{/n} "Уясни себе раз и навсегда: ты — животное. Когда у нас есть потребность в мон-кай, мы используем вас. Когда кого-то вроде тебя недостаточно — мы идем к равным. Как Ирлиэт пришла ко мне".

traits.locale_text: "What a display! Did you truly put your trust in my kin? Did you think that, between a mon-keigh and her brother by blood, she would choose you?" {n}Marazhai's laughter is seeping with poison.{/n} "Remember this once and for all: you are an animal. When we have need of mon-keigh, we use you. When we require something more, we turn to our equals. Just as Yrliet turned to me."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

traits.locale_text: "What a display! Did you truly put your trust in my kin? Did you think that, between a mon-keigh and her brother by blood, she would choose you?" {n}Marazhai's laughter is seeping with poison.{/n} "Remember this once and for all: you are an animal. When we have need of mon-keigh, we use you. When we require something more, we turn to our equals. Just as Yrliet turned to me."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

When we have need of mon-keigh, we use you. When we require something more, we turn to our equals. Just as Yrliet turned to me."

When we have need of mon-keigh, we use you. When we require something more, we turn to our equals. Just as Yrliet turned to me."

traits.locale_text: "What a display! Did you truly put your trust in my cousin? Did you think that, between a mon-keigh and her blood brother, she would choose you?" {n}Marazhai's laughter drips with poison.{/n} "Remember this and never forget it: you are an animal. When we have need of mon-keigh, we use you. When we require something more, we turn to our equals. Just as Yrliet turned to me."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: « Quelle démonstration ! Aviez-vous réellement placé votre confiance en ma cousine ? Vous pensiez que si elle devait choisir entre {mf|un|une} mon-keigh et son frère de sang, elle se tournerait vers vous ? » {n}Le rire de Marazhai transpire le venin.{/n} « Mettez-vous ça dans la tête une bonne fois pour toutes : vous êtes des animaux. Lorsque nous avons besoin des mon-keigh, nous les utilisons. Lorsque nous avons besoin d'un peu plus, nous nous tournons vers nos semblables. De la même façon qu'Yrliet s'est tournée vers moi. »
languages.original_text: "What a display! Did you truly put your trust in my cousin? Did you think that, between a mon-keigh and her blood brother, she would choose you?" {n}Marazhai's laughter drips with poison.{/n} "Remember this and never forget it: you are an animal. When we have need of mon-keigh, we use you. When we require something more, we turn to our equals. Just as Yrliet turned to me."

traits.locale_text: « Quelle démonstration ! Aviez-vous réellement placé votre confiance en une de mes semblables ? Vous pensiez que se retrouvant à devoir choisir entre {mf|un|une} mon-keigh et son frère de sang, elle se tournerait vers vous ? » {n}Le rire de Marazhai transpire le venin.{/n} « Mettez-vous ça dans la tête une bonne fois pour toutes : vous êtes des animaux. Lorsque nous avons besoin des mon-keigh, nous les utilisons. Lorsque nous avons besoin d'un peu plus, nous nous tournons vers nos semblables. De la même façon qu'Yrliet s'est tournée vers moi. »
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: “哎哟，这可真是太有趣了！莫非你真的信任过我的表妹吗？是选择猴子，还是选择她的亲族？莫非你以为她会选择你吗？”{n}玛拉斋的笑声中充满了恶毒。{/n}“千万别忘了，你不过是头活畜罢了。当我们需要的时候，我们会利用你，而当我们需要更多东西时，我们会向我们的族人求助，正如伊莉耶特向我求助一样。”
languages.original_text: "What a display! Did you truly put your trust in my cousin? Did you think that, between a mon-keigh and her blood brother, she would choose you?" {n}Marazhai's laughter drips with poison.{/n} "Remember this and never forget it: you are an animal. When we have need of mon-keigh, we use you. When we require something more, we turn to our equals. Just as Yrliet turned to me."

traits.locale_text: “哎哟，这可真是太有趣了！莫非你真的信任过我的族人吗？是选择猴子，还是选择她的亲族？莫非你以为她会选择你吗？”{n}玛拉斋的笑声中充满了恶毒。{/n}“千万别忘了，你不过是头活畜罢了。当我们需要的时候，我们会利用你，而当我们需要更多东西时，我们会向我们的族人求助，正如伊莉耶特向我求助一样。”
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: 「いいザマだ！お前は本当に俺のいとこを信用していたのか？モン＝ケイと、血を分けた兄弟を天秤にかけて、彼女がお前を選ぶとでも思ったのか？」{n}マラズハイの笑い声には毒がこもっている。{/n}「よく覚えておくがいい。お前は獣なのだ。モン＝ケイは必要な時に利用するのみ。それ以上のものを必要とする時、俺たちは対等な者に頼る。ユリエットが俺に頼ったようにな」
languages.original_text: "What a display! Did you truly put your trust in my cousin? Did you think that, between a mon-keigh and her blood brother, she would choose you?" {n}Marazhai's laughter drips with poison.{/n} "Remember this and never forget it: you are an animal. When we have need of mon-keigh, we use you. When we require something more, we turn to our equals. Just as Yrliet turned to me."

traits.locale_text: 「いいザマだ！お前は本当に俺のいとこを信用していたのか？モン＝ケイと、血を分けた兄弟を天秤にかけて、彼女がお前を選ぶとでも思ったのか？」{n}マラズハイの笑い声には毒がこもっている。{/n}「よく覚えておくがいい。お前は獣なのだ。モン＝ケイは必要な時に利用するのみ。それ以上のものを必要とする時、俺たちは対等な者に頼る。ユリエットが俺に頼ったようにな」
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: "Was für ein Anblick! Habt Ihr wirklich einer meiner Verwandten getraut? Dachtet Ihr, dass sie sich bei der Wahl zwischen {mf|einem|einer} Chem-Pan-Sey und einem ihrer Blutsbrüder wirklich für Euch entscheiden würde?" {n}Marazhais Lachen trieft nur so vor Gift.{/n} "Begreift es ein für alle Mal – Ihr seid ein Tier. Wenn wir {mf|einen|eine} Chem-Pan-Sey brauchen, benutzen wir Euch. Wenn wir etwas mehr brauchen, suchen wir Ebenbürtige. Deshalb wandte sich Yrliet an mich."
languages.original_text: "What a display! Did you truly put your trust in my cousin? Did you think that, between a mon-keigh and her blood brother, she would choose you?" {n}Marazhai's laughter drips with poison.{/n} "Remember this and never forget it: you are an animal. When we have need of mon-keigh, we use you. When we require something more, we turn to our equals. Just as Yrliet turned to me."

traits.locale_text: "Was für ein Anblick! Habt Ihr wirklich einer meiner Verwandten getraut? Dachtet Ihr, dass sie sich bei der Wahl zwischen {mf|einem|einer} Chem-Pan-Sey und einem ihrer Blutsbrüder wirklich für Euch entscheiden würde?" {n}Marazhais Lachen trieft nur so vor Gift.{/n} "Begreift es ein für alle Mal – Ihr seid ein Tier. Wenn wir {mf|einen|eine} Chem-Pan-Sey brauchen, benutzen wir Euch. Wenn wir etwas mehr brauchen, suchen wir Ebenbürtige. Deshalb wandte sich Yrliet an mich."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: «¡Qué espectáculo! ¿De verdad depositaste tu confianza en mi prima? ¿Creías que elegiría a {mf|un|una} mon-keigh antes que a su hermano de sangre?». {n}La risa de Marazhai rezuma veneno.{/n} «Recuerda esto y no lo olvides jamás: eres un animal. Cuando necesitamos a los mon-keigh, os usamos. Cuando necesitamos algo más, acudimos a nuestros iguales. Como Yrliet acudió a mí».
languages.original_text: "What a display! Did you truly put your trust in my cousin? Did you think that, between a mon-keigh and her blood brother, she would choose you?" {n}Marazhai's laughter drips with poison.{/n} "Remember this and never forget it: you are an animal. When we have need of mon-keigh, we use you. When we require something more, we turn to our equals. Just as Yrliet turned to me."

traits.locale_text: «¡Qué espectáculo! ¿De verdad depositaste tu confianza en mi prima? ¿Creías que elegiría a {mf|un|una} mon-keigh antes que a su hermano de sangre?». {n}La risa de Marazhai rezuma veneno.{/n} «Recuerda esto y no lo olvides jamás: eres un animal. Cuando necesitamos a los mon-keigh, os usamos. Cuando necesitamos algo más, acudimos a nuestros iguales. Como Yrliet acudió a mí».
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: "Manzaraya bak, hayret doğrusu! Akrabama gerçekten de güvenmiş miydin? Bir mon-keigh'le kan kardeşi arasında kalsa seni mi seçer sandın?" {n}Marazhai'ın kahkahasından zehir damlıyor.{/n} "Bunu kafana kazı, asla da unutma: Sen hayvanın tekisin. Mon-keighlere ihtiyacımız olunca sizden istifade ederiz. Bundan fazlasına ihtiyacımız olduğunda ise kendi dengimize başvururuz. Yrliet de bana başvurdu."
languages.original_text: "What a display! Did you truly put your trust in my cousin? Did you think that, between a mon-keigh and her blood brother, she would choose you?" {n}Marazhai's laughter drips with poison.{/n} "Remember this and never forget it: you are an animal. When we have need of mon-keigh, we use you. When we require something more, we turn to our equals. Just as Yrliet turned to me."

traits.locale_text: "Manzaraya bak, hayret doğrusu! Gerçekten de kuzenime güvenmiş miydin? Bir mon-keighle kan kardeşi arasında seçim yapması gerekse, seni mi seçer sandın?" {n}Marazhai'ın kahkahasından zehir damlıyor.{/n} "Bunu kafana kazı, asla da unutma: Sen hayvanın tekisin. Mon-keighlere ihtiyacımız olunca sizden istifade ederiz. Bundan fazlasına ihtiyacımız olduğunda ise kendi dengimize başvururuz. Yrliet de bana başvurdu."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai
